text: Woody Island, also known as Yongxing Island (永兴岛 or 永興島 or Yǒngxīng Dǎo) and known as Phu Lam Island (Đảo Phú Lâm), is the largest of the Paracel Islands in the South China Sea. "New city established on Yongxing Island," China Daily (PRC). 24 July 2012; retrieved 2013-4-29. The island is controlled by the People's Republic of China. It is part of the city of Sansha. Soliders of the People's Liberation Army are stationed on the island. The island is also claimed by the Taiwan, Republic of China, and Vietnam. == Related pages== *South China Sea Islands ==Footnotes== ==Other websites== *Aerial photos of Woody Island and its airport *Satellite image of Woody Island by Google Maps Category:Islands of China Category:Islands of Taiwan Category:Islands of Vietnam
title: Woody Island (South China Sea)
